itunes:title: Episode 490 - Who Are "The Proud Boys"?
title: Episode 490 - Who Are "The Proud Boys"?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with controversial Proud Boys member Joe Biggs to discuss the recent protests and who the "Proud Boys" are as a group, what they believe in, and why they have been labeled a terrorist group.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with controversial Proud Boys member Joe Biggs to discuss the recent protests and who the "Proud Boys" are as a group, what they believe in, and why they have been labeled a terrorist group.
